djangocms-blogit

  • Getting started

Getting started¶

Requirements¶

  • django-cms == 2.4.3
  • django-filer == 0.9.5
  • django-hvad == 0.3
  • django-taggit == 0.10

Installation¶

To install djangocms-blogit with pip run:

$ pip install djangocms-blogit

Setup¶

Setup django-cms and django-filer than add to INSTALLED_APPS:

INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    'hvad',
    'taggit',
    'blogit',
    ...
)
